AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: blades agent
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] travelled far and wide, taking up a different profession in each town. In some towns [PAWN_pronoun] was a carpenter, in others a farmer, occasionally [PAWN_pronoun] would even join the local guild. [PAWN_nameDef], assuming that is [PAWN_possessive] real name, is actually an agent of the Emperor's Blades, whose sole purpose was to monitor the prophecies.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: arena champion
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Many have entered the pit in the arena in search of fame, fortune and glory. Many felt the same sinking feeling in their stomach when faced with the sight of [PAWN_nameDef], and usually felt absolutely nothing shortly after.
